actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 93-139.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 1379 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize further appropriations for the Office of Environmental Quality, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes appropriations in an amount not to exceed $1,500,000 for each of fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 1976 for the Office of Environmental Quality. Amends 42 U.S.C. 4374

titles.title: A bill to authorize further appropriations for the Office of Environmental Quality, and for other purposes.
